metadata.title: CVE-2023-31022 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability inthe kernel mode layer, where a NULL-pointer dereference may lead to denialof service.
